RumorFact.Text: One of the Nomai discovered a campsite on a large planetoid, which none of the Nomai constructed. They placed a signal beacon there so that they could easily find it again.

ExploreFact.Text: I found an old campsite on the north pole of a large planetoid in Briar's Hollow.

One of the Nomai, against the wishes of the others, lurked near this campsite until a strange alien returned to it. The Nomai revealed himself, at which point the alien quickly fled, abandoning a stone tablet.
The Nomai decided to wait again, to see if the alien would return. The alien did, and the Nomai was able to return the stone tablet that the alien left behind.
In the days after returning the tablet, the Nomai noticed shapes in the fog that seemed to be watching them.
An alien appeared to a Nomai named Okalis, and led him through a node at the center of Briar's Hollow into a strange, enclosed area.

RumorFact.Text: The Nomai constructed a lab to analyze the soil of the camp planetoid.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a small lab near the equator of the camp planetoid.
There's some sort of broken crystal on the table.
Some Nomai text says there may be a way to repair the crystal in some sort of concert hall.
The Nomai discovered that this planetoid seemed to be composed of the remnants of many planets.
I found an old treehouse on Lover's Rock.
I found a recording of two individuals named Okalis and Amylax talking, before writing their names on the wall.
